page.title: 07MAYESBROOK PARK
page.content: There are many entrances to this park. One is in Longbridge Road. Close by is a Catholic church called St. Thomas More Church. In the park it is mainly grass, trees and flowers. There is an athletics stadium which was used by {Essex Beagles Sports {Club.}It has a running track,football pitch and areas for long, triple and high jumping. Some schools use this for their games lessons and it is used for the town sports. In the park there are tennis courts, which are used by secondary school pupils and students from the polytechnic. There is also a boating lake with sailing dinghies for hire.
